GP10bhpc101u:6: bhagavān api tā rātṛīḥ śāradotphullamallikāḥ[*1] / vīkṣya rantuṃ manaś cakre yogamāyām upāśritaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:7: [*1] śarado mallikāvikasahetutvābhāve 'pi hetutvoktyā 'bhinavatvaṃ tena ca sarvapuṣpavikāso vyajyate |
GP10bhpc101u:16: kiṃ ca śṛṅgārakathāpadeśena viśeṣato nivṛttipareyaṃ pañcādhyāyīti vyaktīkariṣyāmaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:17: tā rātrīḥ “yātābalā vrajaṃ siddhā mayemā raṃsyatha kṣapāḥ” iti pratiśrutā ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,29.1||
GP10bhpc101u:19: tadoḍurājaḥ kakubhaḥ karair mukhaṃ prācyā vilimpann aruṇena śantamaiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:20: sa carṣaṇīnām udagāc chuco mṛjan priyaḥ priyāyā iva dīrghadarśanaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:21: tadā tasminn eva kṣaṇe tatpratītaye uḍurājaś candra udagād uditaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:23_0: dīrghakālena darśanaṃ yasya sa priyaḥ svapriyāyā mukham aruṇena kuṅkumena yathā vilimpati
GP10bhpc101u:23_1: tathā prācyāḥ kakubho diśo mukhaṃ śantamaiḥ sukhatamaiḥ karai raśmibhir aruṇenodayarāgeṇa
GP10bhpc101u:25: tathā carṣaṇināṃ janānāṃ śucas tāpaglānīr mṛjann apanayan ||BhPC_10,29.2||
GP10bhpc101u:28: vanaṃ ca tatkomalagobhī rañjitaṃ jagau kalaṃ vāmadṛśāṃ manoharam //
GP10bhpc101u:29: kumut kumudaṃ vikasanīyaṃ vidyate yasya taṃ kumudvantam |
GP10bhpc101u:33: tathā vanaṃ ca tasya komalair gobhī raśmibhī rañjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalaṃ madhuraṃ jagau agāyata |
GP10bhpc101u:35: vāmadṛśāṃ vāmā manoharā dṛśo yāsāṃ tāsāṃ manoharaṃ yathā ||BhPC_10,29.3||
GP10bhpc101u:37: niśamya gītāṃ tad anaṅgavardhanaṃ vrajastriyaḥ kṛṣṇagṛhītamānasāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:38: ājagmur anyonyam alakṣitodyamāḥ sa yatra kānto javalolakuṇḍalāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:39: asāpatnyāyānyonyam alakṣito na jñāpita udyamo yābhis tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:40: sa kānto yatra tatra gītadhvani-mārgeṇa ājagmuḥ[*2] |
GP10bhpc101u:41: javena vegena lolāni cañcalāni kuṇḍalāni yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,29.4||
GP10bhpc101u:42: [*2] jagmur iti vaktavye ājagmur ity uktiḥ śukasya kṛṣṇāntike svāvasthānasphūrteḥ ||
GP10bhpc101u:47: śrīkṛṣṇasūcakaśabdaśarvaṇena tatpravaṇacittānāṃ tatkṣaṇam eva traivargikakarmanivṛttiṃ dyotayantya ivārdhāvasitaṃ karma vihāya yayuḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:49: payaḥ sthālīsthaṃ cullyām adhiśrityaitat kvāthamapratīkṣamānāḥ kāścid yayuḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:57: kāśca kāścit kṛṣṇatuṣṭyarthaṃ karma tadāsaktam anasāmanyathā kṛtam api phalaty eveti dyotayann āha-vyatyasteti |
GP10bhpc101u:58: sthānataḥ svarūpataś cordhvādhodhāraṇena viparyayaṃ prāptāni vastrābharaṇāni yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,29.7||
GP10bhpc101u:60: tā vāryamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ pitṛbhir bhrātṛbandhubhiḥ / govindāpahṛtātmāno na nyavartanta mohitāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:61: na ca kṛṣṇākṛṣṭamanasāṃ vighnāḥ prabhavantīty āha-tā vāryamāṇā iti ||BhPC_10,29.8||
GP10bhpc101u:65: [*5] mudritanetrāḥ, yadvā mīlitaṃ locanam anyāśeṣajñānaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:67: prāg api tadbhāvanāyuktās tadā nitarāṃ dadhyur ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,29.9||
GP10bhpc101u:73: kiṃ ca tadānīm evaṃ taṃ paramātmānaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhyānataḥ prāptāḥ satyo guṇamayaṃ dehaṃ jahur ity āha ślokadvayena-duḥsaheti |
GP10bhpc101u:74: nanu kathaṃ jahuḥ paramātmeti jñānābhāvād ity āśaṅkyāha-jārabuddhyāpīti |
GP10bhpc101u:77: nanu tad api prārabdhakarmabandhane sati kathaṃ jahus tatrāha-sadyaḥ prakṣīṇa-bandhanā iti |
GP10bhpc101u:78: nanu kathaṃ bhogam antareṇa prārabdhaṃ karma kṣīṇaṃ bhogenaiva sadyaḥ kṣīṇam ity āha-duḥsaheti |
GP10bhpc101u:79: duḥsaho yaḥ preṣṭhavirahas tena tīvras tāpas tena dhutāni gatāny aśubhāni yāsām |
GP10bhpc101u:81: tathā dhyānena prāptā acyutasya āśleṣeṇa yā nirvṛtiḥ paramasukhabhogas tayā kṣīṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ puṇyabandhanaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:82: ato dhyānena paramātmaprāptes tatkālasukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ niḥśeṣakarmakṣayād guṇamayaṃ dehaṃ jahur iti ||
GP10bhpc101u:84: [*6] atra “jighāṃsayāpi haraye” ity atreva jārabuddhyāpīty apinā tādṛśabuddher nindyatvaṃ vyajya vastumahimnātiprāśastyaṃ vyañjitam |
GP10bhpc101u:85: [*7] guṇamayaṃ dehaṃ jahur ity uktyā cinmayadehena golokādau tatprāptir dhvanyate |
GP10bhpc101u:88: kṛṣṇaṃ viduḥ paraṃ kāntaṃ na tu brahmatayā mune /
GP10bhpc101u:90: [*8] ato guṇadhiyāṃ śrīkṛṣṇaguṇaikānubaddhapremamayīnāṃ tāsāṃ guṇapravāhoparamaḥ cinmayaguṇaparam-parāśrayasya cidvigrahasyoparamaḥ sāyujyamuktiḥ brahmopāsakānām iva katham iti |
GP10bhpc101u:91_0: nanu yathā patiputrādīnāṃ vastuto brahmatve' pi na tadbhajanān mokṣas tathā buddhyabhāvād
GP10bhpc101u:91_1: evaṃ kṛṣṇe 'pi brahmabuddhyabhāvena tatsaṅgatiḥ kathaṃ mokṣahetur iti śaṅkate-kṛṣṇaṃ vidur iti |
GP10bhpc101u:95: uktaṃ purastād etat te caidyaḥ siddhiṃ yathā gataḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:98: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-jīveṣv āvṛtaṃ brahmatvaṃ kṛṣṇasya tu hṛṣīkeśatvād anāvṛtam ato na tatra buddhyapekṣeti ||BhPC_10,29.13||
GP10bhpc101u:100: nṛṇāṃ niḥśreyasārthāya vyaktir bhagavato nṛpa / avyayasyāprameyasya[*9] nirguṇasya guṇātmanaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:102: nanu dehī katham anāvṛtaḥ syād ata āha-nṛṇām iti |
GP10bhpc101u:104: bhagavata evaṃrūpā abhivyaktir ato na dehasādṛśyam atra vaktuṃ yujyata iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,29.14||
GP10bhpc101u:106: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ sneham aikyaṃ sauhṛdam eva ca /
GP10bhpc101u:107: nityaṃ harau vidadhato[*10] yānti tanmayatāṃ[*11] hi te //
GP10bhpc101u:110: ato yathā kathañcit tadāsaktir muktikāraṇam ity āha-kāmam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:114: na caivaṃ vismayaḥ kāryo bhavatā bhagavaty aje / yogeśvareśvare kṛṣṇe yata etad vimucyate //
GP10bhpc101u:115: na ca bhagavato 'yam atibhāra ity āha-na caivam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:116: yataḥ śrīkṛṣṇād etat sthāvarādikam api vimucyate ||BhPC_10,29.16||
GP10bhpc101u:118: tā dṛṣṭvāntikam āyātā bhagavān vrajayoṣitaḥ / avadad vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vācaḥpeśair vimohayan //
GP10bhpc101u:120: [*12] rasamayarāsalīlāprasaṅge īdṛśas te praśnaḥ samādhānaprapañcaś ca rasavighātakatvād anucita iti vyañjayan svayam evotkaṇṭhayā prastauti ||
GP10bhpc101u:123: svāgataṃ vo mahābhāgāḥ priyaṃ kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:125: sarvāḥ sasaṃbhramam āgatā vilokya sabhayam ivāha-vrajasyeti ||BhPC_10,29.18||
GP10bhpc101u:127: rajany eṣā ghorarūpā[*13] ghorasattvaniṣevitā / pratiyāta vrajaṃ neha stheyaṃ strībhiḥ sumadhyamāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:129: ato jyotsnayā dinaprāyatvād aghoraiḥ sattvair bhṛṅgakokilādyair niṣevitā,
GP10bhpc101u:130: athavā ghoraṃ duṣṭānāṃ bhayajanakaṃ sattvaṃ balaṃ yasya tena mayā niṣevitā |
GP10bhpc101u:133: ittham evāgre mā vicinvanti, mā yāta ity ādi yojyam |
GP10bhpc101u:136: mātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā bhrātaraḥ patayaś ca vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:137: vicinvanti hy apaśyanto mā kṛḍhvaṃ bandhusādhvasam //
GP10bhpc101u:140: bandhūnāṃ sādhvasaṃ kṛcchraṃ mā kṛdhvaṃ mā kurutety arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,29.20||
GP10bhpc101u:142: dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ kusumitaṃ rākeśakararañjitam / yamunānilalīlaijat tarupallavaśobhitam //
GP10bhpc101u:145: yamunāsparśino 'nilasya līlā mandagatis tayā ejantaḥ kampamānās tarūṇāṃ pallavās taiḥ śobhitam ||BhPC_10,29.21||
GP10bhpc101u:147: tad yāta mā ciraṃ goṣṭhaṃ śuśrūṣadhvaṃ patīn satīḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:148: krandanti vatsā bālāś ca tān pāyayata duhyata //
GP10bhpc101u:151: atha vā madabhisnehād bhavatyo yantritāśayāḥ / āgatā hy upapannaṃ vaḥ prīyante mayi jantavaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:157: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ paro dharmo hy amāyayā /
GP10bhpc101u:162: asvargyam ayaśasyaṃ ca phalgu kṛcchraṃ bhayāvaham /
GP10bhpc101u:164: phalgu tuccham | kṛcchraṃ duḥsaṃpādyam | aupapattyaṃ jārasaukhyam ||BhPC_10,29.26||
GP10bhpc101u:166: śravaṇād darśanād dhyānān mayi bhāvo 'nukīrtanāt / na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tato gṛhān //
GP10bhpc101u:169: kṛtvā mukhāny ava śucaḥ śvasanena śuṣyad bimbādharāṇi caraṇena bhuvaḥ likhantyaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:170: asrair upāttamaṣibhiḥ kucakuṅkumāni tasthur mṛjantya uruduḥkhabharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm //
GP10bhpc101u:172: śucaḥ śokād udgatena śvasanena śuṣyanto bimbaphalasadṛśā adharā yeṣu mukheṣu tāni ava avāñci kṛtvā tathā 'ṅguṣṭhena mahīṃ likhantyaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:173: tathā gṛhītakajjalair aśrubhiḥ kucakuṅkumāni kṣalayantyas tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:174: yata uruduḥkhasya bharo bhāro yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,29.29||
GP10bhpc101u:176: preṣṭhaṃ priyetaram iva pratibhāṣamāṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tadarthavinivartitasarvakāmāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:177: netre vimṛjya ruditopahate sma kiñcit saṃrambhagadgadagiro 'bruvatānuraktāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:179: kiñcit saṃrambhena kopāveśena gadgadā giro yāsāṃ tā abruvat sma |
GP10bhpc101u:184: maivaṃ vibho 'rhati bhavān gadituṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ santyajya sarvaviṣayāṃs tava pādamūlam /
GP10bhpc101u:185: bhaktā bhajasva duravagraha mā tyajāsmān devo yathādipuruṣo bhajate mumukṣūn //
GP10bhpc101u:188: tava pādamūlaṃ bhaktāḥ sevitavatīr asmān bhajasva mā tyajeti ||BhPC_10,29.31||
GP10bhpc101u:190: yat patyapatyasuhṛdām anuvṛttir aṅga strīṇāṃ svadharma iti dharmavidā tvayoktam /
GP10bhpc101u:191: astv evam etad upadeśapade tvayīśe preṣṭho bhavāṃs tanubhṛtāṃ kila bandhur[*14] ātmā //
GP10bhpc101u:193: api ca yad uktam “patyapatya-” ity ādi tvayā dharmavideti sopahāsam evam,
GP10bhpc101u:194: etad upadeśānāṃ pade viṣaye tvayy evāstu |
GP10bhpc101u:198: bhogyasya hi sarvasya bhoktā ātmaiveśa ity ataḥ preṣṭho bandhuś ca bhavān eveti sarvabandhuṣu karaṇīyaṃ tvayy evāstv ity arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:199: atha vā dharmopadeśānāṃ pade sthāne dharmopadeṣṭari tvayi saty asmāsu ca dharmaṃ jijñāsamānāsu satīṣu tvayā dharmavidā yad uktam evam etad astu |
GP10bhpc101u:200: na tu tvaṃ dharmopadeṣṭā kintu bhavān ātmeti |
GP10bhpc101u:201: atha vā yad uktam etad upadeśapade tadgocare puruṣe 'stu nāma, tvayi tu īśe svāmini saty evam |
GP10bhpc101u:203: yatas tanubhṛtāṃ tvam ātmā phalarūpa iti |
GP10bhpc101u:204: yadvā yad uktaṃ “patyādiśuśrūṣaṇaṃ dharma” iti evam etat tvayy evāstu |
GP10bhpc101u:208: na hīśvaram adhiṣṭhānaṃ vinā ko 'pi patiputrādir nāmeti |
GP10bhpc101u:212: kurvanti hi tvayi ratiṃ kuśalāḥ sva ātman[*15] nityapriye patisutādibhir ārtidaiḥ kim /
GP10bhpc101u:213: tan naḥ prasīda parameśvara[*16] mā sma chindyā[*17] āśāṃ bhṛtāṃ tvayi cirād aravindanetra //
GP10bhpc101u:216: [*17] “chindyādāśām” iti pāṭhaḥ | tatra bhavān ity adhyāhāraḥ, chāndasaḥ puruṣavyatyayo vā |
GP10bhpc101u:219: tathā ca śāstram-“kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yam ātmā 'yaṃ ca lokaḥ” iti ||BhPC_10,29.33||
GP10bhpc101u:221: cittaṃ sukhena bhavatāpahṛtaṃ gṛheṣu yan nirviśaty uta karāv api gṛhyakṛtye /
GP10bhpc101u:222: pādau padaṃ na calatas tava pādamūlād yāmaḥ kathaṃ vrajam atho karavāma kiṃ vā //
GP10bhpc101u:223: kiṃ ca “pratiyāta” iti yad uktaṃ tad aśakyaṃ, tvayaiva cittādīnām apahṛtatvād ity āhuḥ-cittam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:224: yad asmākaṃ cittam etāvantaṃ kālaṃ sukhena gṛheṣu nirviśati tat tvayāpahṛtam |
GP10bhpc101u:225: karāv api yau gṛhakṛtye nirviśatas tāv api |
GP10bhpc101u:229: no ced vayaṃ virahajāgnyupayuktadehā dhyānena yāma padayoḥ padavīṃ sakhe te //
GP10bhpc101u:231: no 'smākaṃ tavādharāmṛtapūrvakeṇa tavaiva hāsasahitenāvalokena kalagītena ca jāto yo hṛcchayāgniḥ kāmāgnis taṃ siñca |
GP10bhpc101u:232: no ced vayaṃ tāvad eko 'gnis tathā virahāj janiṣyate yo 'gnis tena copayuktadehā dagdhaśarīrā yogina iva te padavīm antikaṃ dhyānena yāma prāpnuyāmaḥ ||BhPC_10,29.35||
GP10bhpc101u:234: yarhy ambujākṣa tava pādatalaṃ ramāyā dattakṣaṇaṃ kvacid araṇyajanapriyasya /
GP10bhpc101u:235: asprākṣma tatprabhṛti nānyasamakṣam aṅga sthātuṃs tvayābhiramitā bata pārayāmaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:236: nanu svapatīn evopagacchata ta enam agniṃ siñceyur iti cet tatrāhuḥ-yarhīti |
GP10bhpc101u:237: ramāyā lakṣmyā dattakṣaṇaṃ dattotsavaṃ dattāvasaraṃ vā |
GP10bhpc101u:238: tad api kvacid eva na sarvadā |
GP10bhpc101u:240: araṇyajanapriyatvād araṇye kvacid yarhy asprākṣma spṛṣṭavatyo vayaṃ tatra ca tvayābhiramitā ānanditāḥ satyas tadārabhyānyasamakṣaṃ sthātum api na pārayāmaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:241: tucchās te na rocanta ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,29.36||
GP10bhpc101u:243: śrīr yat padāmbujarajaś cakame tulasyā labdhvāpi vakṣasi padaṃ kila bhṛtyajuṣṭam /
GP10bhpc101u:244: yasyāḥ svavīkṣaṇakṛte 'nyasuraprayāsas tadvad vayaṃ ca tava pādarajaḥ prapannāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:245: tvatpādasaubhāgyaṃ tv aticitram ity āhuḥ-śrīr iti |
GP10bhpc101u:246: vakṣasy asāpatnyaṃ sthānaṃ labdhvāpi tulasyā sapatnyā saha tava pādāmbujarajaḥ kāmayate sma |
GP10bhpc101u:248: yasyāḥ svavīkṣaṇakṛte śrīr ātmānaṃ vilokaya tv ity etad artham anyeṣāṃ brahmādīnāṃ tapobhiḥ prayāsaḥ sā tad rajas tadvad vayam api prapannā iti ||BhPC_10,29.37||
GP10bhpc101u:250: tan naḥ prasīda vṛjinārdana te 'nghrimūlaṃ prāptā visṛjya vasatīs tvadupāsanāśāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:253: tvadupāsane tvadbhajana evāśā yāsāṃ tā vayaṃ vāsatīr gṛhān visṛjya hitvā yogina iva prāptāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:254: tava sundarasmitavilasitanirīkṣaṇena yas tīvraḥ kāmas tena taptacittānām |
GP10bhpc101u:258: dattābhayaṃ ca bhujadaṇḍayugaṃ vilokya vakṣaḥ śriyaikaramaṇaṃ[*19] ca bhavāma[*20] dāsyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:259: [*18] niṣedhapakṣe vṛjinārda na iti cchedaḥ, gṛhādi tyaktvā na prāptā vayam iti yojanā |
GP10bhpc101u:260: [*19] śriyāḥ ekaramaṇam iti cchedaḥ | sandhir ārṣaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:261: [*20] niṣedhapakṣe kiṃ dāsyo bhavāmeti kākvā naivety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:262: nanu gṛhasvāmyaṃ vihāya dāsyaṃ kim iti prārthyate 'ta āhuḥ-vīkṣyati |
GP10bhpc101u:264: tathā kuṇḍalayoḥ śrīr yayos te gaṇḍasthale yasmin,
GP10bhpc101u:265: adhare sudhā yasmiṃs tac ca tac ca tava mukhaṃ vīkṣya dattābhayaṃ bhujadaṇḍayugmaṃ vakṣaś ca śriyā ekam eva ramaṇaṃ ratijanakaṃ vīkṣya dāsya eva bhavāmeti ||BhPC_10,29.39||
GP10bhpc101u:267: kā stry aṅga te kalapadāyatamūrcchitena[*21] sammohitāryacaritān na[*22] calet trilokyām /
GP10bhpc101u:268: trailokyasaubhagam idaṃ ca nirīkṣya rūpaṃ yad godvijadrumamṛgāḥ pulakāny abibhran //
GP10bhpc101u:270: [*22] niṣedhapakṣe āryacaritabhaṅgabhiyā kā strī nāpayāyād iti yojanā |
GP10bhpc101u:271: nanu jugupsitam aupapatyam ity uktam, tatrāhuḥ-kā strīti |
GP10bhpc101u:272: aṅga he kṛṣṇa, kalāni padāni yasmiṃs tad āyataṃ dhīrgaṃ mūrcchitaṃ svarālāpabhedas tena |
GP10bhpc101u:273: pāṭhāntare[*23] kalapadāmṛtamayaṃ veṇugītaṃ tena saṃmohitā kā vā strī āryacaritān nijadharmān na calet |
GP10bhpc101u:274: yanmohitāḥ puruṣā api calitāḥ, kiṃ ca trailokyasaubhagam iti yad yataḥ abibhrann abibharuḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:279: vyaktaṃ bhavān vrajabhayārtiharo[*24] 'bhijāto devo yathādipuruṣaḥ suralokagoptā /
GP10bhpc101u:280: tan no[*25] nidhehi karapaṅkajam ārtabandho taptastaneṣu ca śirassu ca kiṅkarīṇām //
GP10bhpc101u:282: [*25] niṣedhapakṣe kiṅkarīṇām api śirassu karaṃ no vidhehi mā sthāpayeti |
GP10bhpc101u:286: iti viklavitaṃ tāsāṃ śrutvā yogeśvareśvaraḥ / prahasya sadayaṃ gopīr ātmārāmo 'py arīramat //
GP10bhpc101u:291: priyasyekṣaṇenotphullāni mukhāni yāsāṃ tābhiḥ udārahāsaś ca dvijāś ca teṣu kundakusumavad-dīdhitir yasya saḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:298: kṣvelyāvalokahasitair vrajasundarīṇām uttambhayan ratipatiṃ ramayāṃ cakāra //
GP10bhpc101u:299: bāhuprasāraś ca parirambhaś ca karādīnām ālabhanaṃ sparśaś ca narma parihāsaś ca nakhāgrapātaś ca taiḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:301: avalokaiś ca hastitaiś ca kāmaṃ tāsām uddīpayaṃs tā ramayāmāsa ||BhPC_10,29.46||
GP10bhpc101u:307: tāsāṃ tatsaubhagamadaṃ vīkṣya mānaṃ ca keśavaḥ / praśamāya prasādāya tatraivāntaradhīyata //
GP10bhpc101u:310: keśavaḥ kaś ca īśaś ca tau vaśayatīti tathā saḥ ||BhPC_10,29.48||
GP10bhpc101u:311: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **29**
GP10bhpc101u:313: unamattavan na niyataṃ bhramantībhir vane vane // 1 //
GP10bhpc101u:316: antarhite bhagavati sahasaiva vrajāṅganāḥ / atapyaṃs tam acakṣāṇāḥ kariṇya iva yūthapam //
GP10bhpc101u:320: ākṣiptacittāḥ pramadā ramāpates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tadātmikāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:321_0: gatyā cānurāgasmitābhyāṃ vibhramekṣitāni savilāsanirīkṣaṇāni taiś ca manoramā ālāpāś
GP10bhpc101u:321_1: ca vihārāḥ krīḍāś ca vibhramā anye ca vilāsās taiś ca ramāpater gatyādibhir etair
GP10bhpc101u:322: atas tasminn evātmā yāsāṃ tās tasya vividhāś ceṣṭhā jagṛhus tadanukaraṇenākrīḍan ||BhPC_10,30.2||
GP10bhpc101u:325: asāv ahaṃ tv ity abalās tadātmikā nyavediṣuḥ kṛṣṇavihāravibhramāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:327: priyasya gatyādiṣu pratirūḍhā āviṣṭā mūrtayo yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:328: ataḥ kṛṣṇavihāra-vibhramāḥ kṛṣṇasya eva vihāravibhramāḥ krīḍāvilāsā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:329: aham eva kṛṣṇa iti parasparaṃ niveditavatyaḥ ||BhPC_10,30.3||
GP10bhpc101u:331: gāyantya uccair amum eva saṃhatā vicikyur unmattakavad vanād vanam /
GP10bhpc101u:332: papracchur ākāśavad antaraṃ bahir bhūteṣu santaṃ puruṣaṃ vanaspatīn //
GP10bhpc101u:336: bhūteṣv antaraṃ madhye santaṃ puruṣaṃ bahiś ca santam iti ||BhPC_10,30.4||
GP10bhpc101u:338: dṛṣṭo vaḥ kaccid aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha no manaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:340: tat prapañcayati navabhiḥ-tatra mahattvād ete paśyeyur ity āśayāśvatthādīn pṛcchanti-dṛṣṭa iti |
GP10bhpc101u:341: premahāsavilasitair avalokanair asmākaṃ mano hṛtvā cora iva gato vo yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃ dṛṣṭa iti ||BhPC_10,30.5||
GP10bhpc101u:343: kaccit kurabakāśokanāgapunnāgacampakāḥ / rāmānujo māninīnām ito[*26] darpaharasmitaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:345: mahāntaḥ svapuṣpair bahūpakāriṇaś ceti kurabakādīn pṛcchanti-kaccid iti |
GP10bhpc101u:346: he kurabakādayaḥ, darpaharaṃ smitaṃ yasya saḥ ito gataḥ kaccid dṛṣṭa iti ||BhPC_10,30.6||
GP10bhpc101u:348: kaccit tulasi kalyāṇi govindacaraṇapriye / saha tvālikulair bibhrad dṛṣṭas te 'tipriyo 'cyutaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:349: alikulaiḥ saha tvā tvāṃ bibhrat tavātipriyas tvayā kiṃ dṛṣṭa iti ||BhPC_10,30.7||
GP10bhpc101u:351: mālaty adarśi vaḥ kaccin mallike jātiyūthike / prītiṃ vo janayan yātaḥ karasparśena mādhavaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:352: guṇātireke 'pi namratvād imāḥ paśyeyur iti pṛcchanti-mālatīti |
GP10bhpc101u:353: he mālati mallike, jāti, yūthike, vo yuṣmābhiḥ kim adarśi dṛṣṭaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:354: karasparśena vaḥ prītiṃ janayan kiṃ yāta iti |
GP10bhpc101u:358: ye 'nye parārthabhavakā yamunopakūlāḥ śaṃsantu kṛṣṇapadavīṃ rahitātmanāṃ naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:359: phalādibhiḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ saṃtarpakā ete paśyeyur iti pṛcchanti-cūteti |
GP10bhpc101u:361: he cūtādayaḥ, ye 'nye ca parārthabhavakāḥ parārtham eva bhavo janma yeṣāṃ te |
GP10bhpc101u:364: te bhavanto rahitātmanāṃ śūnyacetasāṃ naḥ kṛṣṇapadavīṃ kṛṣṇasya mārgaṃ śaṃsantu kathayantu ||BhPC_10,30.9||
GP10bhpc101u:366: kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghrisparśotsavotpulakitāṅgaruhair vibhāsi /
GP10bhpc101u:367: apy aṅghrisambhava urukramavikramād vā āho varāhavapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇena //
GP10bhpc101u:369: tvayā kiṃ tapaḥ kṛtaṃ yā tvaṃ keśavāṅghrisparśotsavā keśavasyāṅghrisparśenotsavo yasyāḥ sā |
GP10bhpc101u:372: tatra viśeṣaṃ pṛcchati-api kim ayam utsavo 'ṅghrisaṃbhavo 'dhunā tavaikadeśāṅghrisparśasaṃbhūtaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:373: yadvā naitāvat kintu urukramavikramāt pūrvam eva trivikramasya padā sarvākramaṇāt |
GP10bhpc101u:375: naitāvad eva, api tu tato 'pi pūrvaṃ varāhasya vapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇeneti |
GP10bhpc101u:376: atas tvayā nūnaṃ dṛṣṭas taṃ darśayeti ||BhPC_10,30.10||
GP10bhpc101u:378: apy eṇapatny[*27] upagataḥ priyayeha gātrais tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:379: kāntāṅgasaṅgakucakuṅkumarañjitāyāḥ kundasrajaḥ kulapater iha vāti gandhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:380: [*27] eṇapatnīti “patyur no yajñasaṃyoge” iti sūtrād eṇānāṃ bhavāntarayajñair yājñikatvaṃ |
GP10bhpc101u:383: he sakhi eṇapatni, api kim upagataḥ samīpaṃ gataḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:385: priyayā saheti yad uktaṃ tatra dyotakam |
GP10bhpc101u:386: kāṇtāyā aṅgasaṅgas tena tatkucakuṅkumena rañjitāyāḥ kundakusumasrajo gandhaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:390: bāhuṃ priyāṃsa[*28] upadhāya gṛhītapadmo rāmānujas tulasikālikulair madāndhaiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:391: anvīyamāna iha vas taravaḥ praṇāmaṃ kiṃ vābhinandati caran praṇayāvalokaiḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:393: phalabhāreṇa natāṃs tarūn kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇatā iti matvā priyayā saha tasya gativilāsaṃ saṃbhāvayantyaḥ pṛcchanti-bāhum iti |
GP10bhpc101u:394: tulasikāyā alikulair atas tadāmodamadāndhair anvīyamāno 'nugamyamāna iha carann iti ||BhPC_10,30.12||
GP10bhpc101u:396: pṛcchatemā latā bāhūn apy āśliṣṭā vanaspateḥ / nūnaṃ tatkarajaspṛṣṭā bibhraty utpulakāny aho //
GP10bhpc101u:397: kāścid āhuḥ-he sakhyaḥ, imā latāḥ kṛṣṇena saṅgatā nūnam, ata imāḥ pṛcchata |
GP10bhpc101u:399: vanaspateḥ patyur bāhunāśliṣṭā api aho bhāgyaṃ nūnaṃ tan nakhaiḥ spṛṣṭā yata utpulakāni bibhrati |
GP10bhpc101u:400: na hi svapatisaṅgatāv īdṛkpulakasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,30.13||
GP10bhpc101u:402: ity unmattavaco gopyaḥ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇakātarāḥ / līlā bhagavatas tās tā hy anucakrus tadātmikāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:403: unmattavat prapacchur ity etat prapañcitam idānīṃ-“ramāpates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tadātmikāḥ” iti yad uktaṃ tat prapañcayati-itīti |
GP10bhpc101u:404: unmattavaco gopyaḥ unmattavacasaś ca tā gopyaś ca |
GP10bhpc101u:408: kasyāścit pūtanāyantyāḥ kṛṣṇāyanty apibat stanam / tokayitvā rudaty anyā padāhan śakaṭāyatīm //
GP10bhpc101u:409: kasyāścid ity ādibhiś caturbhir anukaraṇaṃ prapañcyate,
GP10bhpc101u:410: tataś caturbhis tanmayatvaṃ punar ekenānukaraṇam iti vivekaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:411: pūtanāyantyāḥ pūtanāvad ācarantyāḥ kṛṣṇavad ācarantī stanam apibat |
GP10bhpc101u:416: [*29] ghoṣāḥ kiṅkiṇyas tāsāṃ niḥsvanaiḥ sahitāvaṅghrī karṣantī satī riṅgayāmāsa |
GP10bhpc101u:418: daityāyitvā daityavat tṛṇāvartavad ātmānaṃ kṛtvā ekā kṛṣṇārbhabhāvanāṃ kṛṣṇasyārbhaṃ bālyaṃ bhāvayati yā tām anyāṃ jahāra ||
GP10bhpc101u:421: āhūya dūragā yadvat kṛṣṇas tam anuvartatīm /
GP10bhpc101u:422: veṇuṃ kvaṇantīṃ krīḍantīm anyāḥ śaṃsanti sādhv iti //
GP10bhpc101u:424: yadvad yathā kṛṣṇas tathāhūya taṃ kṛṣṇam anuvartamānām |
GP10bhpc101u:428: mā bhaiṣṭa vātavarṣābhyāṃ tattrāṇaṃ vihitaṃ maya /
GP10bhpc101u:430: yatantī prayatnaṃ kurvatī ambaram uttarīyaṃ vastram unnidadhe ūrdhvaṃ dhṛtavatī ||
GP10bhpc101u:434: cakṣūṃṣy āśv apidadhvaṃ vo vidhāsye kṣemam añjasā //
GP10bhpc101u:437: baddhānyayā srajā kācit tanvī tatra ulūkhale / bhītā sudṛk pidhāyāsyaṃ bheje bhītiviḍambanam //
GP10bhpc101u:442: evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pṛcchamānā vṛndāvanalatās tarūn / vyacakṣata vanoddeśe padāni paramātmanaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:443: evaṃ punar api vṛndāvane latās tarūṃś ca kṛṣṇaṃ pṛcchantyo vanoddeśe vanapradeśe |
GP10bhpc101u:447: tais taiḥ padais tatpadavīm anvicchantyo 'grato' balāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:451: kasyāḥ padāni caitāni yātāyā nandasūnunā / aṃsanyastaprakoṣṭhāyāḥ kareṇoḥ kariṇā yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:452: tenāṃse nyastaḥ prakoṣṭho yasyāḥ | kareṇor hastinyāḥ ||BhPC_10,30.27||
GP10bhpc101u:454: anayārādhito nūnaṃ bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ / yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto yām anayad rahaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:458: yān brahmeśo ramā devī dadhur mūrdhny aghanuttaye[*30] //
GP10bhpc101u:460: he ālyaḥ sakhyaḥ, aho dhanyā atipuṇyā govindāṅghryabjareṇavaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:462: asmābhir apy etad reṇvabhiṣekeṇa tathaiva kṛṣṇaḥ prāptuṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,30.29||
GP10bhpc101u:464: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ[*31] padāni yat /
GP10bhpc101u:470: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-bhaved[*33] evaṃ yadi tasyāḥ padāni saṃpṛktāni na bhaveyus tāni tu no duḥkhaṃ kurvantīti ||BhPC_10,30.30||
GP10bhpc101u:471: [*33] yadi tasyāḥ padāni saṃpṛktāni na bhaveyus tarhi evaṃ kṛṣṇaprāptisādhanaṃ tatpadarajaḥsevanaṃ bhavet |
GP10bhpc101u:472: tāni nu saṃpṛktāni tatpadāni no duḥkhaṃ kurvanti |
GP10bhpc101u:473: tasyāḥ pādarajasā miśritatvāt kṛṣṇapādarajasa iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:475: na lakṣyante padāny atra tasyā nūnaṃ tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:477: tad asaṃpṛktān kevalaṃ kṛṣṇapādareṇūn eva vicinvatyas tān dṛṣṭvā punar atyantaṃ samatapan |
GP10bhpc101u:479: khidyatī sujāte sukumāre aṅghritale yasyās tām unninye skandham āropitavān ||BhPC_10,30.31||
GP10bhpc101u:481: atra prasūnāvacayaḥ priyārthe preyasā kṛtaḥ / prapadākramaṇa ete paśyatāsakale pade //
GP10bhpc101u:482: prapadābhyām ākramaṇaṃ kṣoṇīmardanaṃ yayoḥ | ata evāsakale pade paśyateti ||BhPC_10,30.32||
GP10bhpc101u:484: keśaprasādhanaṃ tv atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam / tāni cūḍayatā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam //
GP10bhpc101u:486: kāntām adhikṛtya tāni prasūnāni cūḍayatā cūḍānukāreṇa badhnatā dhruvam upaviṣṭam ||BhPC_10,30.33||
GP10bhpc101u:489: kāmināṃ darśayan dainyaṃ strīṇāṃ caiva durātmatām //
GP10bhpc101u:494: akhaṇḍitaḥ strīvibhramair anākṛṣṭo 'pi tathā cet kim iti reme 'ta āha-kāminām iti ||
GP10bhpc101u:497: sā ca mene tadātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ sarvayoṣitām / hitvā gopīḥ kāmayānā mām asau bhajate priyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:499: kāmo yānam āgamanasādhanaṃ yāsāṃ tā gopīr hitvā māṃ bhajata iti hetor ātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ mene iti ||
GP10bhpc101u:502: evam uktaḥ priyām āha skandha āruhyatām iti / tataś cāntardadhe kṛṣṇaḥ sā vadhūr anvatapyata //
GP10bhpc101u:507: hā nātha ramaṇa preṣṭha kvāsi kvāsi mahābhuja / dāsyās te kṛpaṇāyā me sakhe darśaya sannidhim //
GP10bhpc101u:514: tato 'viśan vanaṃ candra jyotsnā yāvad vibhāvyate /
GP10bhpc101u:515: tamaḥ praviṣṭam ālakṣya tato nivavṛtuḥ striyaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:516: tatas tayāpi sahitāḥ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇāya vanam aviśan | tato harer anveṣaṇān nivṛttāḥ ||BhPC_10,30.42||
GP10bhpc101u:518: tanmanaskās tadalāpās tadviceṣṭās tadātmikāḥ / tadguṇān eva gāyantyo nātmagārāṇi sasmaruḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:519: evaṃ tam aprāptā api svagṛhān naiva smṛtavatyaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:523: punaḥ pulinam āgatya kālindyāḥ kṛṣṇabhāvanāḥ / samavetā jaguḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tadāgamanakāṅkṣitāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:524_0: kintu pūrvaṃ yatra śrīkṛṣṇena saṅgatir āsīt tad eva kālindyāḥ puliam āgatya kṛṣṇaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:524_1: bhāvayanti dhyāyantīti tathā tāḥ kṛṣṇasyāgamanaṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ militāḥ satyaḥ
GP10bhpc101u:525: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ triṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ **30**
GP10bhpc101u:530: jayati[*35] te 'dhikaṃ janmanā vrajaḥ śrayata indirā śaśvad atra hi /
GP10bhpc101u:531: dayita dṛśyatāṃ[*36] dikṣu tāvakās tvayi dhṛtāsavas tvāṃ vicinvate //
GP10bhpc101u:532_0: [*35] jayatītyādiślokeṣu prāyaścaturṇāṃ pādānāṃ dvitīyākṣarahalaikyaṃ keṣucit pādeṣu
GP10bhpc101u:532_1: prathamasaptamākṣarahalaikyaṃ tatra kvacit śasabavādīnām ālaṅkārikādisamayasiddhasāvarṇyād aikyam iti jñeyam |
GP10bhpc101u:533: [*36] tvayā dṛśyatāṃ pratyakṣībhūyatām iti preraṇātyāgenākarmakatvād bhāve loṭ |
GP10bhpc101u:534: yadvā asmābhir bhavān dṛśyatām iti karmaṇi loṭ |
GP10bhpc101u:536: he dayita, te janmanā vrajo 'dhikaṃ yathā bhavati tathā jayaty utkarṣeṇa vartate |
GP10bhpc101u:537: yasmāt tvam atra jātas tasmad indirā lakṣmīr atra hi śrayate vrajam alaṅkṛtya vartate |
GP10bhpc101u:538: evaṃ vraje sarvasmin modamāne 'tra tu tāvakās tvadīyā gopījanās tvayi tvadartham eva kathañcid dhṛtā asavo yais te tvāṃ vicinvate |
GP10bhpc101u:541: yadvā evaṃ tvayā dṛṣyatām ete vicinvata iti ||BhPC_31.1||
GP10bhpc101u:544: suratanātha te 'śulkadāsikā varada nighnato neha kiṃ vadhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:545: [*37] athavā dṛśaiva śulkadāsikāḥ dṛgrūpaśulkenaiva dāsīr api tyāgena mārayataḥ iti yojanā |
GP10bhpc101u:546: atra svatantrāṇāṃ bāhūnāṃ vaktṛtvād aparā āhur iti sarvaślokeṣv avatāraṇā, athāpi saṅgatir ucyate |
GP10bhpc101u:547: tatra vicinvantu mama kim iti cet tatrāhuḥ-śaradeti |
GP10bhpc101u:548_0: śarad udāśaye śaratkālīne sarasi sādhu jātaṃ samyak jātaṃ yat sarasijaṃ vikasitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:548_1: padmaṃ tasyodare garbhe yā śrīs tāṃ muṣṇāti haratīti tathā tayā dṛśā netreṇa he suratanātha
GP10bhpc101u:549: aśulkadāsikā amūlyadāsīr no nighnato mārayatas te tava tvayā kriyamāṇa iha loke 'yaṃ vadho na bhavati kim |
GP10bhpc101u:550: śastreṇaiva vadho vadhaḥ kiṃ dṛśā vadho na bhavati, kintu bhavaty eva |
GP10bhpc101u:551: atas tava dṛśā 'pahṛtaprāṇapratyarpaṇāya tvayā dṛśyatām iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:552: tvayā dṛśyatām iti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvatra vākyaśeṣaḥ ||BhPC_31.2||
GP10bhpc101u:555: vṛṣamayātmajād[*38] viśvato bhayād ṛṣabha te vayaṃ rakṣitā muhuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:558: taccaritram agre vakṣyamāṇam api rāsāt pūrvabhāvīti jñeyam |
GP10bhpc101u:559: kiṃ ca bahubhyo mṛtyubhyaḥ kṛpayā rakṣitvā kimitīdānīṃ dṛśā manmathaṃ preṣya ghātayasīty āhuḥ-viṣeti |
GP10bhpc101u:561_0: viṣamayāj jalādyo 'pyayo nāśas tasmāt tathā vyālarākṣasād aghāsurād varṣān mārutād
GP10bhpc101u:561_1: vaidyutānalād aśanipātāt vṛṣo 'ṛṣṭas[*39] tasmān mayātmajād vyomād viśvato 'nyasmād
GP10bhpc101u:561_2: api sarvato bhayāc ca kāliyadamanādinā rakṣitāḥ kim idānīm upekṣasa iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_31.3 ||
GP10bhpc101u:563: na khalu gopīkānandano bhavān akhiladehinām antarātmadṛk /
GP10bhpc101u:564: vikhanasārthito viśvaguptaye sakha udeyivān sātvatāṃ kule //
GP10bhpc101u:565: [*39] ariṣṭavyomāsurayor vadhasya bhāvitve 'pi gargādimukhāc chrutatvena vipralambapoṣakatvena vā bhūtavan nirdeśaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:566: api ca viśvapālanāyāvatīrṇasya tava bhaktopekṣā 'tyantam anucitety āśayenāhuḥ-na khalv iti |
GP10bhpc101u:567: he sakhe, bhavān khalu niścitaṃ yaśodāsuto na bhavati, kintu sarvaprāṇināṃ buddhisākṣī |
GP10bhpc101u:568: nanu sa kiṃ dṛśyo bhavati tatrāhuḥ-vikhanasā brahmaṇā viśvapālanāya prārthitaḥ sansātvatāṃ kule udeyivān udita iti ||BhPC_31.4||
GP10bhpc101u:570: viracitābhayaṃ vṛṣṇidhūrya te caraṇam[*40] īyuṣāṃ saṃsṛter bhayāt /
GP10bhpc101u:571: karasaroruhaṃ kānta[*41] kāmadaṃ śirasi dhehi naḥ śrīkaragraham //
GP10bhpc101u:573: [*41] yadvā kāntaṃ ca tatkāmadaṃ ceti svataḥ sukharūpam abhīṣṭadaṃ ceti kecit |
GP10bhpc101u:574: tasmāt tvadbhaktānām asmākam etat prārthanācatuṣṭayaṃ saṃpādayety āhuḥ-viracitābhayam ity ādi caturbhiḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:576: saṃsṛter bhayāt te caraṇam īyuṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptānāṃ prāṇināṃ viracitaṃ dattam abhayaṃ yena tat tathā he kānta,
GP10bhpc101u:577: kāmadaṃ varadaṃ tathā śriyaḥ karaṃ gṛhṇātīti tathā tad bhavatkarasaroruhaṃ na śirasi dehi ||BhPC_31.5||
GP10bhpc101u:580: bhaja sakhe bhavatkiṅkarīḥ[*42] sma no jalaruhānanaṃ cāru darśaya //
GP10bhpc101u:585: nija janānāṃ yaḥ smayo garvas tasya dhvaṃsanaṃ nāśakaṃ smitaṃ yasya tathābhūta he sakhe,
GP10bhpc101u:588: prathamaṃ tāvaj jalaruhānanaṃ cāru yoṣitāṃ no darśaya ||BhPC_31.6||
GP10bhpc101u:591: phaṇiphaṇārpitaṃ[*43] te padāmbujaṃ kṛṇu kuceṣu naḥ kṛndhi hṛcchayam //
GP10bhpc101u:592: [*43] phaṇinaḥ phaṇāsv arpaṇamātreṇa tadviṣadarpasyeva hṛdi sparśamātreṇa kandarpasya nāśo na duṣkara iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:593_0: aviśeṣeṇa praṇatāṇāṃ dehināṃ pāpakarśanaṃ pāpahantṛ tṛṇacarān paśūn apy anu gacchati
GP10bhpc101u:593_1: kṛpayeti tathā saubhāgyena śriyo niketanaṃ vīryātirekeṇa phaṇinaḥ phanāsv arpitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:593_2: te padāmbujaṃ naḥ kuceṣu kṛṇu kuru |
GP10bhpc101u:598: vidhikarīr[*44] imā vīra muhyatīr adharasīdhunāpyāyayasva naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:599: [*44] yadvā giraiva vidhikarīr adhunā virahāt saṃmuhyatīḥ imāḥ pratyakṣāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:601: tavaiva madhurayā girā valgūni vākyāni yasyāṃ tayā budhānāṃ manojñayā hṛdyayā gambhīrayety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:602: muhyatīr imā no vidhikarīḥ kiṅkarīr adharasīdhunā āpyāyayasva saṃjīvayeti ||BhPC_31.8||
GP10bhpc101u:604: tava kathāmṛtaṃ[*45] taptajīvanaṃ kavibhir īḍitaṃ kalmaṣāpaham /
GP10bhpc101u:605: śravaṇamaṅgalaṃ śrīmad ātataṃ bhuvi gṛṇanti te bhūridā janāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:606: [*45] yadvā santaptā āhuḥ-tava kathā eva ṃrtaṃ mṛtiḥ saivoddīpanavidhayāsmān mārayati |
GP10bhpc101u:607: tathā taptajīvanaṃ tapte taile jīvanam ivety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:608: tathā ca ye 'smat purato gṛṇanti te bhūridā mahāghātakāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:611: kiṃ ca asmākaṃ tvadvirahe prāptam eva mataṇaṃ kintu tvatkathāmṛtaṃ pāyayadbhiḥ sukṛtibhir vañcitam ity āhuḥ-taveti |
GP10bhpc101u:614: prasiddhāmṛtād utkarṣam āhuḥ-kavibhir brahmavidbhir apīḍitaṃ stutam |
GP10bhpc101u:622: evaṃbhūtaṃ tvatkathāmṛtam ātataṃ yathā bhavati tathā ye bhuvi gṛṇanti nirūpayanti te janā bhūridā bahudātāraḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:624: yadvā evaṃbhūtaṃ tvatkathāmṛtaṃ ye bhuvi gṛṇanti te bhūridāḥ pūrvajanmasu bahu dattavantaḥ sukṛtina ity arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:625: etad uktaṃ bhavati-ye kevalaṃ kathāmṛtaṃ gṛṇanti te 'pi tāvad atidhanyāḥ kiṃ punar ye tvāṃ paśyanti,
GP10bhpc101u:628: prahasitaṃ priya premavīkṣaṇaṃ viharaṇaṃ ca te dhyānamaṅgalam[*46] /
GP10bhpc101u:629: rahasi saṃvido yā hṛdi spṛśaḥ kuhaka no manaḥ kṣobhayanti hi //
GP10bhpc101u:631: nanu matkathāśravaṇenaiva nirvṛtā bhavata kiṃ maddarśanena,
GP10bhpc101u:633: tvadvilāsakṣubhitacittā vayaṃ tatrāpi śāntiṃ na vindāma ity āhuḥ-prahasitam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:634: he priya, kuhaka kapaṭa, saṃvidaḥ saṅketanarmāṇi ||BhPC_31.10||
GP10bhpc101u:636: calasi yad vrajāc cārayan paśūn nalinasundaraṃ nātha te padam /
GP10bhpc101u:637: śilatṛṇāṅkuraiḥ sīdatīti naḥ kalilatāṃ manaḥ kānta gacchati //
GP10bhpc101u:638: kiṃ ca tvayi vayam atipremārdracittās tvaṃ punar asmāsu kena hetunā kapaṭam ācarasīty āhuḥ ślokadvayena-calasīti |
GP10bhpc101u:640_0: yat yadā vrajāc calasi paśūṃś cārayaṃs tadā tan nalinasundaraṃ komalaṃ te padaṃ śilaiḥ
GP10bhpc101u:640_1: kaṇiśais tṛṇair aṅkuraiś ca sīdati kliśyed iti no manaḥ kalilatām asvāsthyaṃ gacchati prāpnoti |
GP10bhpc101u:644: ghanarajasvalaṃ darśayan muhur manasi naḥ smaraṃ vīra yacchasi //
GP10bhpc101u:645_0: tvaṃ tu dinaparikṣaye sāyaṃ kāle nīlakuntalair āvṛtaṃ ghanarajasvalaṃ gorajaś churitaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:645_1: vanaruhānanam alimālākulaparāgacchuritapadmatulyam ānanaṃ bibhrat tac ca muhur muhur
GP10bhpc101u:645_2: darśayan no manasi kevalaṃ smaraṃ[*47] yacchasy arpayasi |
GP10bhpc101u:646: na tu saṅgaṃ dadāsīti kapaṭas tvam iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_31.12||
GP10bhpc101u:650: caraṇapaṅkajaṃ śantamaṃ ca te ramaṇa naḥ staneṣv arpayādhihan //
GP10bhpc101u:652: ato 'dhunā kapaṭaṃ vihāyaivaṃ kurv iti prārthayanti ślokadvayena-praṇatakāmadam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:654: padmajena brahmaṇārcitam āpadi dhyeyaṃ dhyānamātreṇāpannivartakaṃ śantamaṃ ca sevāsamaye 'pi sukhatamaṃ te caraṇapaṅkajaṃ kāmatāpaśāntaye naḥ staneṣv arpayeti ||BhPC_31.13||
GP10bhpc101u:657: itararāgavismāraṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ[*49] vitara vīra nas te 'dharāmṛtam //
GP10bhpc101u:658: [*49] nṛṇām iti puṃsām api, kim uta nārīṇām |
GP10bhpc101u:659: api ca he vīra, te 'dharāmṛtaṃ no vitara dehi |
GP10bhpc101u:660: svaritena nāditena veṇunā suṣṭhu cumbitam iti nādāmṛtavāsitam iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:661: itararāgavismāraṇaṃ nṛṇām itareṣu sārvabhaumādisukheṣu rāgam icchāṃ vismārayati vilāpayatīti tathā tat ||BhPC_31.14||
GP10bhpc101u:663: aṭati yad bhavān ahni kānanaṃ truṭir yugāyate tvām apaśyatām /
GP10bhpc101u:664: kuṭilakuntalaṃ śrīmukhaṃ ca te jaḍa[*50] udīkṣatāṃ pakṣmakṛd dṛśām //
GP10bhpc101u:666: yaḥ pakṣmāṇi kṛntati sa nimīlanābhāvasaṃpādaka eva ajaḍo rasajñaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:667: kiṃ vā svadṛśāṃ pakṣmacchideva ajaḍaḥ udīkṣatāṃ uccaiḥ paśyatu |
GP10bhpc101u:668: vayaṃ tu pakṣmapihitadṛśo jaḍāḥ kiṃ paśyāmeti darśane 'pi vidhāna duḥkham iti bhāvaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:669: kiṃ ca kṣaṇam api tvadadarśane duḥkhaṃ darśane ca sukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvasaṅgaparityāgena yataya iva vayaṃ truṭiḥ kṣaṇārdham api yugavad bhavati |
GP10bhpc101u:671: punaś ca kathañcid dinānte te tava śrīman mukham uduccair īkṣamānānāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣāṃ pakṣmakṛd brahmā jaḍo manda eva |
GP10bhpc101u:672: nimeṣamātram apy antaram asahyam iti darśane sukham uktam ||BhPC_31.15||
GP10bhpc101u:675: gatividas tavodgītamohitāḥ kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi //
GP10bhpc101u:677: patīn sutān anvayāṃs tatsaṃbandhino bhrātṝn bāndhavāṃś cātivilaṅghya tava samīpam āgatā vayam |
GP10bhpc101u:679: gativido 'smad āgamanaṃ jānataḥ, gītagatīr vā jānataḥ, gativido vayaṃ vā |
GP10bhpc101u:680: tavodgītenoccair gītena mohitāḥ he kitava śaṭha,
GP10bhpc101u:681: evaṃbhūtā yoṣito niśi svayam āgatās tvām ṛte kas tyajet |
GP10bhpc101u:685: bṛhaduraḥ śriyo vīkṣya dhāma te muhur atispṛhā[*52] muhyate manaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:686: [*51] rahasi saṃvido yatra tam | alugārṣaḥ | prahasitam ānanaṃ yatra | premṇā vīkṣṇaṃ yatra |
GP10bhpc101u:688: yadvā spṛheti saṃpadāditvād bhāve kvipi tṛtīyā |
GP10bhpc101u:691: atas tvayā tyaktānām asmākaṃ prāktanatvaddarśananidānahṛdrogasya tvatsaṅgatyaiva cikitsāṃ kurvityāśayenāhur dvayena-rahasīti |
GP10bhpc101u:692: śriyo dhāma te bṛhad viśālam uraś ca vīkṣyātispṛhā bhavati |
GP10bhpc101u:693: tathā ca muhur muhur mano muhyati ||BhPC_31.17||
GP10bhpc101u:695: vrajavanaukasāṃ[*53] vyaktir aṅga te vṛjinahantry alaṃ viśvamaṅgalam /
GP10bhpc101u:696: tyaja manāk ca nas tvatspṛhātmanāṃ svajanahṛdrujāṃ yan niṣūdanam //
GP10bhpc101u:698: tava ca vyaktir abhivyaktir vrajavanaukasāṃ sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa vṛjinahantrī duḥkhanirasanīti viśvamaṅgalaṃ sarvamaṅgalarūpā ca |
GP10bhpc101u:699: atas tvatspṛhātmanāṃ tvatspṛhārūḍhamanasāṃ no manāg īṣat kim api tyaja muñca |
GP10bhpc101u:702: svajanahṛdrogāṇāṃ yad atigopyaṃ niṣūdanaṃ nivartakam auṣadhaṃ tat tvam eva vetasīti gūḍhābhiprāyam ||BhPC_31.18||
GP10bhpc101u:704: yat te sujātacaraṇāmburuhaṃ staneṣu bhītāḥ śanaiḥ priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu /
GP10bhpc101u:705: tenāṭavīm aṭasi tad vyathate na kiṃ svit kūrpādibhir bhramati dhīr bhavadāyuṣāṃ naḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:708: yat te tava sukumāraṃ padābjaṃ kaṭhineṣu kuceṣu saṃmardanaśaṅkitāḥ śanair dadhīmahi[*54] dhārayema vayam |
GP10bhpc101u:710: “nayasi” iti pāṭhe paśūn vā kāñcid anyāṃ vā ātmānam eva vā nayasi prāpayasi |
GP10bhpc101u:711_0: tat tataḥ tat padāmbujaṃ vā kūrpādibhiḥ sūkṣmapāṣāṇādibhiḥ kiṃ svin na vyathate kathaṃ
GP10bhpc101u:711_1: nu nāma na vyatheteti bhavān[*55] evāyur jīvanaṃ yāsāṃ tāsāṃ no dhīr bhramati muhyatīti ||BhPC_31.19 ||
GP10bhpc101u:712: [*54] dadhīmahi dhartuṃ yogyam | “arhe kṛtyatṛcaś ca” iti liṅ |
GP10bhpc101u:713: [*55] bhavadāyuṣām iti | ittham eva ca “tvayi dhṛtāsavaḥ” ity upakramo 'pi |
GP10bhpc101u:714: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ ekatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **31**
GP10bhpc101u:718: sad ayaṃ nandayan gopīr udgato nandanandanaḥ // 2 //
GP10bhpc101u:720: iti gopyaḥ pragāyantyaḥ pralapantyaś ca citradhā /
GP10bhpc101u:724: citradhā anekadhā susvaram uccaiḥ kṛṣṇadarśane lālasātispṛhā yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,32.1||
GP10bhpc101u:728: sākṣān manmathamanmatho jaganmohanasya kāmasyāpi manasy udbhūtaḥ kāmaḥ sākṣāt tasyāpi mohaka ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.2||
GP10bhpc101u:731: uttasthur yugapat sarvās tanvaḥ prāṇam ivāgatam //
GP10bhpc101u:740_0: bhrukuṭiṃ bhruvam ābadhya kuṭilīkṛtya premasaṃrambheṇa praṇayakopāveśena vihvalā
GP10bhpc101u:740_1: vivaśā daṣṭādharoṣṭhā kaṭāḥ kaṭākṣās tair ye ākṣepāḥ paribhavās tais tāḍayantīvaikṣat ||BhPC_10,32.6 ||
GP10bhpc101u:743: āpītam api nātṛpyat santas[*56] taccaraṇaṃ yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:745: animiṣantībhyām animīlantībhyāṃ dṛgbhyām āpītam api samyag dṛṣṭam api punaḥ punar juṣāṇā nātṛpyat ||BhPC_10,32.7||
GP10bhpc101u:747: taṃ kācin netrarandhreṇa hṛdi kṛtya nimīlya ca /
GP10bhpc101u:753: jahur virahajaṃ tāpaṃ prājñaṃ prāpya yathā janāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:754: prājñaṃ īśvaraṃ prāpya yathā mumukṣavo janāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:755: yadvā prājñaṃ brahmajñaṃ prāpya yathā saṃsāriṇaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:756: yadvā prājñaṃ sauṣuptaṃ[*58] prāpya yathā viśvataijasāvasthā jīvāḥ ||BhPC_10,32.9||
GP10bhpc101u:763: yadvā puruṣo 'nuśāyī prakṛtyādyupādhibhir vṛto yathā 'dhikaṃ virocate tadvat ||BhPC_10,32.10||
GP10bhpc101u:765: tāḥ samādāya kālindyā nirviśya[*59] pulinaṃ vibhuḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:768: vikasatkundamandāraiḥ surabhir yo 'nilas tasmāt ṣaṭpadā yasmiṃs tat ||BhPC_10,32.11||
GP10bhpc101u:772: śaraccandrāṃśūnāṃ sandohaiḥ samūhair dhvastaṃ doṣātamo rātrigataṃ tamo yasmiṃs tat |
GP10bhpc101u:774: hastarūpais taralais taraṅgair ācitā āstṛtā komalā vālukā yasmin |
GP10bhpc101u:775: evaṃbhūtaṃ pulinaṃ tāḥ samādāya nirviśya tābhir vṛto 'dhikaṃ vyarocateti pūrveṇānvayaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.12||
GP10bhpc101u:778: svair uttarīyaiḥ kucakuṅkumāṅkitair acīk pann āsanam ātmabandhave //
GP10bhpc101u:779: tāś ca manorathānām antaṃ yayuḥ pūrṇakāmā babhūvuḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:781: ayam arthaḥ-yathā karmakāṇḍe śrutayaḥ parameśvaram apaśyantyas tat tatkāmānubandhair apūrṇā iva bhavanti,
GP10bhpc101u:782: jñānakāṇḍe tu parameśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadāhlādapūrṇāḥ kāmānubandhaṃ jahati tadvad iti |
GP10bhpc101u:783: āptakāmā api premṇā tam abhajann ity āha-svair iti |
GP10bhpc101u:791: gopīsabhāgatas tābhiḥ saṃmānitaḥ san cakāsa śuśubhe |
GP10bhpc101u:792: trailokye yā lakṣmīḥ śobhā tasyā ekam eva padaṃ sthānaṃ tadvapur dadhad darśayan ||BhPC_10,32.14||
GP10bhpc101u:797: sahāsalīlekṣaṇena vibhramo vilāso yasyāṃ tayā bhruvopalakṣitāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:802: nobhayāṃś[*63] ca bhajanty eka etan no brūhi sādhu bhoḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:804: tatra bhagavato 'kṛtajñatāṃ tadvacanenaivāpādayitukāmā gūḍhābhiprāyā lokavṛttāntam iva pṛcchanti-bhajata iti |
GP10bhpc101u:808: kecid etad viparyayaṃ yathā bhavati tathā |
GP10bhpc101u:814: mitho bhajanti ye sakhyaḥ svārthaikāntodyamā hi te /
GP10bhpc101u:815: na tatra sauhṛdaṃ dharmaḥ svārthārthaṃ tad dhi nānyathā[*65] //
GP10bhpc101u:818: he sakhyaḥ, upakārapratyupakāratayā ye mitho bhajanti te 'nyaṃ na bhajanti kiṃ tv ātmānam eva |
GP10bhpc101u:820: hi yasmāt svārtha[*66] evaikānta udyamo yeṣāṃ te |
GP10bhpc101u:821: tatra ca na[*67] sauhṛdam ato na sukhaṃ,
GP10bhpc101u:822: na ca dharmo dṛṣṭoddeśād gomahiṣyādibhajanavad ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.17||
GP10bhpc101u:826: bhajanty abhajato ye vai karuṇāḥ pitaro yathā /
GP10bhpc101u:829: ye tv abhajato bhajanti te dvividhāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:831: tatra tu yathākramaṃ dharmakāmau bhavata ity āha-bhajanty abhajata iti ||BhPC_10,32.18||
GP10bhpc101u:833: bhajato 'pi na vai kecid bhajanty abhajataḥ kutaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:840: anye tu gurudruho 'tikaṭhināḥ “sa pitā yas tu poṣakaḥ” iti nyāyād upakartā gurutulyas tasmai druhyantīti tathā te ||BhPC_10,32.19||
GP10bhpc101u:842: nāhaṃ tu sakhyo bhajato 'pi jantūn bhajāmy amīṣām anuvṛttivṛttaye /
GP10bhpc101u:843: yathādhano labdhadhane vinaṣṭe taccintayānyan nibhṛto na veda //
GP10bhpc101u:845: akṣisaṃkocaiḥ parasparaṃ gūḍhasmitamukhīs tā dṛṣṭvā āha-nāhaṃ tv iti |
GP10bhpc101u:846: he sakhyaḥ, ahaṃ teṣāṃ madhye na ko 'pi, kiṃ tu paramakāruṇikaḥ paramasuhṛc ca |
GP10bhpc101u:848: amīṣāṃ bhajatām anuvṛttivṛtaye nirantaradhyānapravṛttyarthaṃ tān na bhajāmi |
GP10bhpc101u:854: evaṃ madarthojjhitalokavedasvānāṃ hi vo mayy anuvṛttaye 'balāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:855: mayā parokṣaṃ bhajatā tirohitaṃ māsūyituṃ mārhatha tat priyaṃ priyāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:856: evaṃ madarthojjhitalokavedasvānāṃ madarthe ujjhito loko yuktāyuktāpratīkṣaṇāt,
GP10bhpc101u:858: svā jñātayaś ca snehatyāgāt yābhis tāsāṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ parokṣam adarśanaṃ yathā bhavati tathā bhajatā yuṣmat premālāpān śṛṇvataiva tirohitam antardhānena sthitam |
GP10bhpc101u:859: tat tasmāt he abalā he priyāḥ,
GP10bhpc101u:860: mā mām[*69] asūyituṃ doṣāropeṇa draṣṭuṃ yūyaṃ mārhatha na yogyāḥ stha ||BhPC_10,32.21||
GP10bhpc101u:862: tathāpi priyaṃ mallakṣaṇam asūyituṃ mārhatheti mā |
GP10bhpc101u:865: na pāraye 'haṃ niravadyasaṃyujāṃ svasādhukṛtyaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi vaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:866: yā mābhajan durjaragehaśṛṅkhalāḥ[*70] saṃvṛścya tad vaḥ pratiyātu sādhunā //
GP10bhpc101u:868: āstām idaṃ, paramarthaṃ tu śṛṇutety āha-neti |
GP10bhpc101u:869: niravadyā saṃyuk saṃyogo yāsāṃ tāsāṃ vo vibudhānām[*71] āyuṣāpi cirakāle 'pi svīyaṃ sādhu kṛtyaṃ pratyupakāraṃ kartuṃ na pāraye na śaknomi |
GP10bhpc101u:871: yā bhavatyo durjarā ajarā yā gehaśṛṅkhalās tāḥ saṃvṛścya niḥśeṣaṃ chittvā mā mām abhajaṃs tāsām |
GP10bhpc101u:873: tasmād vo yuṣmākam eva sādhunā sādhukṛtyena tat yuṣmat sādhu kṛtyaṃ pratiyātu pratikṛtaṃ bhavatu |
GP10bhpc101u:874: yuṣmat sauśīlyenaiva mamānṛṇyaṃ, na tu matkṛtapratyupakāreṇety arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,32.22||
GP10bhpc101u:875: [*71] yadvā vigato budho gaṇanābhijño yasmāt tenānantenāyuṣāpi |
GP10bhpc101u:876: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **32**
GP10bhpc101u:881: itthaṃ bhagavato gopyaḥ śrutvā vācaḥ supeśalāḥ[*72] /
GP10bhpc101u:885: yadvā tasya bhagavato 'ṅgena vapuṣā karacaraṇādyavayavair vopacitāḥ samṛddhā āśiṣo yāsāṃ[*73] tāḥ ||BhPC_10,33.1||
GP10bhpc101u:886: [*73] yadvā tāsāṃ gopīnām aṅgair upacitā āśiṣo yasya |
GP10bhpc101u:890: rāsakrīḍāṃ rāso[*74] nāma bahunartakīyukto nṛtyaviśeṣas tāṃ krīḍām |
GP10bhpc101u:891: anyonyam ābaddhāḥ saṃgrathitā bāhavo yais taiḥ saha ||BhPC_10,33.2||
GP10bhpc101u:892: [*74] “natair gṛhītakaṇṭhānām anyonyāttakaraśriyam / nartakīnāṃ bhaved rāso maṇḍalībhūya nartanam //” iti rāsalakṣaṇam |
GP10bhpc101u:895: yogeśvareṇa kṛṣṇena[*75] tāsāṃ madhye dvayor dvayoḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:900: tatsāhityam abhinayena darśayati-rāsotsava ity akṣaracatuṣṭayādhikena sārdhena |
GP10bhpc101u:901: tāsāṃ maṇḍalarūpeṇāvasthitānāṃ dvayor dvayor madhye praviṣṭena tenaiva kaṇṭhe gṛhītānām ubhayata āliṅgitānām |
GP10bhpc101u:903: yaṃ sarvāḥ striyaḥ svanikaṭaṃ mām evāśliṣṭavān iti manyeraṃs tena etad arthaṃ dvayor dvayor madhye praviṣṭenety arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:905: sarvasannihitatve vā kutaḥ svaikanikaṭatvābhimānas tāsām ity ata uktaṃ-yogeśvareṇeti |
GP10bhpc101u:910: tāvat tatkṣaṇam evautsukyavyāptamanasāṃ sastrīkāṇāṃ devānāṃ vimānaśataiḥ saṅkulaṃ saṅkīrṇaṃ nabho babhūva ||BhPC_10,33.4||
GP10bhpc101u:914: tat tasya bhagavataḥ śrīkṛṣṇasyāmalaṃ nirmalaṃ yaśo jagur iti ||BhPC_10,33.5||
GP10bhpc101u:922: mahāmarakato nīlamaṇir iva haimānāṃ maṇīnāṃ madhye madhye tābhiḥ svarṇavarṇābhir āśliṣṭābhiḥ śuśubhe |
GP10bhpc101u:928: gāyantyas taṃ taḍita iva tā meghacakre virejuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:929: sa yathā tābhiḥ śuśubhe, tathā tā api tena virejur ity āha-pādanyāsair iti |
GP10bhpc101u:930: bhujavidhutibhiḥ karacālanair bhajyamānair madhyaiś caladbhiḥ kucaiś ca paṭaiś ca |
GP10bhpc101u:932: svidyan mukhyaḥ svidyanti svedam udgiranti mukhāni yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:933: kabareṣu raśanāsu ca granthayo dṛḍhā yāsām |
GP10bhpc101u:934: yadvā teṣu tāsu cāgranthayaḥ, śithilagranthaya ity arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:936: tās tu bahuvidhās taḍita iva svedas tuṣāra iva,
GP10bhpc101u:950: unninye pūjitā tena prīyatā sādhu sādhv iti /
GP10bhpc101u:951: tad eva dhruvam unninye tasyai mānaṃ ca bahv adāt //
GP10bhpc101u:954: prīyamāṇena saṃmānitā tajjāty unnayanam eva dhruvaṃ dhruvākhyaṃ tālaviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā unninye unnītavatī ||BhPC_10,33.10||
GP10bhpc101u:958: evaṃ nṛtyagītādinā śrīkṛṣṇasaṃmānitānāṃ tāsām atiprītivilasitaṃ vṛttam āha-kācid iti |
GP10bhpc101u:959: ślathanti valayāni mallikāś ca yasyāḥ sā ||BhPC_10,33.11||
GP10bhpc101u:967: nāṭyena nṛtyena vikṣiptayoś cañcalayoḥ kuṇḍalayos[*77] tviṣeṇa tviṣā maṇḍitaṃ gaṇḍaṃ kapolaṃ tathābhūte svagaṇḍe saṃdadhatyāḥ saṃyojayantyāḥ ||BhPC_10,33.13||
GP10bhpc101u:968: [*77] nṛtyena vikṣipte cañcale kuṇḍale ca svābhāvikī gaṇḍatviṭ ca tatsamāhāras tviṣaṃ tena maṇḍitam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:973: kūjatī nūpure mekhalā ca yasyāḥ sā ||BhPC_10,33.14||
GP10bhpc101u:977: evam anyā api gopyo yathā yathaṃ nānāvibhramair vijahrur ity āha-gopya iti ||BhPC_10,33.15||
GP10bhpc101u:980: gopyaḥ samaṃ bhagavatā nanṛtuḥ svakeśasrastasrajo bhramaragāyakarāsagoṣṭhyām //
GP10bhpc101u:981: tatra vādakeṣu gāyakeṣu gandharvakinnarādiṣu rasāveśena muhyatsu cānyām eva vādyādi-sampattiṃ darśayan rāsasaṃbhramam āha-karṇotpalair iti |
GP10bhpc101u:982: karṇotpalaiś cālakaviṭaṅkair alakālaṅkṛtaiḥ kapolaiś ca gharmaiś ca vaktreṣu śrīḥ śobhā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:984: valayanūpuraghoṣair vādyair vāditraiḥ svakeśebhyaḥ srastāḥ srajo yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:985: etena tālagatisaṃtuṣṭāḥ keśāḥ saśiraḥkampaṃ pādeṣu puṣpavṛṣṭim ivākurvann ity utprekṣitam |
GP10bhpc101u:992: yathā gopyo nānāvibhramair bhagavatā saha vijahrur evaṃ bhagavān api svavilāsais tābhiḥ saha rema ity āha-evam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:994: svapratibimbair vibhramaḥ krīḍā yasya sa iva |
GP10bhpc101u:995: anenaitad darśitam-svīyam eva sarvakalākauśalaṃ saugandhyalāvaṇyamādhuryādi ca tāsu sañcārya tābhiḥ saha reme yathārbhakaḥ svapratibimbair iti ||BhPC_10,33.17||
GP10bhpc101u:998: nāñjaḥ prativyoḍhum alaṃ vrajastriyo visrastamālābharaṇāḥ kurūdvaha //
GP10bhpc101u:999: tās tu bhagavadvilāsair ākulā babhūvur ity āha-tadaṅgeti |
GP10bhpc101u:1000: tasyāṅgasaṅgena prakṛṣṭām utprītis tayā ākulāny avaśānīndriyāṇi yāsāṃ tāḥ viślathabandhān keśādīn añjasā[*78] prativyoḍhuṃ yathāpūrvaṃ dhartuṃ nālaṃ na samarthā babhūvuḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1001: visrastā mālā ābharaṇāni ca yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,33.18||
GP10bhpc101u:1006: na kevalaṃ tā evākulendriyāḥ kintu devyo 'pīty āha-kṛṣṇavikrīḍitam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1008: anenaitat sūcitam-śaśāṅkena vismitena gatau vismṛtāyā tataḥ prāktanāḥ sarve 'pi grahās tatra tatraiva tasthus tataś cātidīrghāsu rātriṣu yathāsukhaṃ vijahrur iti ||BhPC_10,33.19||
GP10bhpc101u:1011: reme sa bhagavāṃs tābhir ātmārāmo 'pi līlayā //
GP10bhpc101u:1013_0: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-“kātyāyani mahāmāye mahāyoginy adhīśvari / nandagopasutaṃ devi patiṃ
GP10bhpc101u:1013_1: me kuru te namaḥ // “[*79] iti pratyekaṃ tābhiḥ prārthanād bhagavatāpi-“yātābalā
GP10bhpc101u:1013_2: vrajaṃ siddhā mayemā raṃsyatha kṣapāḥ / “[*80] iti tathaiva pratiśrutatvāt tāvantam
GP10bhpc101u:1024: mānaṃ dadhatya ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtāni puṇyāni tatkararuhasparśapramodāḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1026_0: sphuratāṃ svarṇakuṇḍalānāṃ kuntalānāṃ ca tviṣā gaṇḍeṣu yā śrīs tayā sudhitenāmṛtāyitena
GP10bhpc101u:1026_1: hāsasahitena nirīkṣaṇena ca ṛṣabhasya patyuḥ kṛṣṇasya mānaṃ dadhatyaḥ pūjāṃ kurvatyas tatkarmāṇi jaguḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1027: tasya kararuhair nakhaiḥ sparśena pramodo yāsāṃ tāḥ ||BhPC_10,33.22||
GP10bhpc101u:1029: tābhir yutaḥ śramam apohitum aṅgasaṅgaghṛṣṭasrajaḥ sa[*82] kucakuṅkumarañjitāyāḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1030: gandharvapālibhir anudruta āviśad vāḥ śrānto gajībhir ibharāḍ iva bhinnasetuḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1033_0: tāsām aṅgasaṅgena ghṛṣṭā saṃmarditā yā srak tasyāḥ ata eva tāsāṃ kucakuṅkumena rañjitāyāḥ
GP10bhpc101u:1033_1: saṃbandhibhir gandharvapālibhir gandharvapā gandharvapataya iva gāyanto yo 'layas
GP10bhpc101u:1033_2: tair anudruto 'nugataḥ sa kṛṣṇo vāḥ udakam āviśat |
GP10bhpc101u:1036: so 'mbhasy alaṃ yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ premṇekṣitaḥ[*83] prahasatībhir itas tato 'ṅga /
GP10bhpc101u:1037: vaimānikaiḥ kusumavarṣibhir īdyamāno reme svayaṃ svaratir[*84] atra gajendralīlaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1041: kiṃ vā svā asādhāraṇī ratir jalakrīḍā yasya |
GP10bhpc101u:1045: cacāra bhṛṅgapramadāgaṇāvṛto yathā madacyud dviradaḥ kareṇubhiḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1047: yamunāyā upavane jalasthalaprasūnānāṃ gandho yasmiṃs tenānilena juṣṭāni diśāṃ taṭāny antā yasmin |
GP10bhpc101u:1048: yadvā diśaś ca taṭaṃ sthalaṃ ca yasminn upavane |
GP10bhpc101u:1054: sa kṛṣṇaḥ satyasaṅkalpo 'nurāgistrīkadambastha evaṃ sarvā niśāḥ sevitavān |
GP10bhpc101u:1055: śaratkāvyakathārasāśrayāḥ śaradi bhavāḥ kāvyeṣu kathyamānā ye rasās teṣām āśrayabhūtā niśāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1057: śṛṅgārarasāśrayāḥ śaradi[*85] prasiddhāḥ kāvyeṣu yāḥ kathās tāḥ siṣeve iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1058: evam apy ātmany evāvaruddhaḥ saurataś caramadhātur na tu skhalito yasyeti kāmajayoktiḥ ||
GP10bhpc101u:1060: [*85] śaratkāvyakathāḥ śaradi sarvadeśakālakavibhir yāvatyo varṇayituṃ śakyante tāvatīḥ kathāḥ siṣeve ācacāra |
GP10bhpc101u:1066: na cedam adharmamātraṃ kalañja-bhakṣaṇādivat kintu mahāsāhasam ity āha-paradārābhimarśanam iti ||BhPC_10,33.28||
GP10bhpc101u:1069: kim abhiprāya etan naḥ saṃśayaṃ chindhi suvrata //
GP10bhpc101u:1070: āptakāmasya nāyam adharma iti ced yady evaṃ kāmābhāvān ninditaṃ kenābhiprāyeṇa kṛtavān iti pṛcchati-āptakāma iti ||BhPC_10,33.29||
GP10bhpc101u:1074: tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ[*87] sarvabhujo yathā //
GP10bhpc101u:1077: parameśvare kaimutikanyāyena parihartuṃ sāmānyato mahatāṃ vṛttam āha-dharmavyatikrama iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1079: tac ca teṣāṃ tejasvināṃ doṣāya na bhavatīti ||BhPC_10,33.30||
GP10bhpc101u:1081: naitat samācarej jātu manasāpi hy anīśvaraḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1082: vinaśyaty ācaran mauḍhyād yathā rudro 'bdhijaṃ viṣam //
GP10bhpc101u:1083: tarhi “yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ” iti nyāyenānyo 'pi kuryād ity āśaṅkyāha-naitad iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1084: anīśvaro dehādiparatantraḥ yathā rudravyatirikto viṣam ācaran bhakṣayan ||BhPC_10,33.31||
GP10bhpc101u:1087: teṣāṃ yat svavacoyuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret //
GP10bhpc101u:1088: kathaṃ tarhi sadācārasya prāmāṇyam ata āha-īśvarāṇām iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1089: teṣāṃ vacaḥ satyam, atas tad uktam ācared eva |
GP10bhpc101u:1091: ataḥ svavacoyuktaṃ teṣāṃ vacasā yadyad yuktam aviruddhaṃ tattad evācaret ||BhPC_10,33.32||
GP10bhpc101u:1093: kuśalācaritenaiṣām iha svārtho na vidyate / viparyayeṇa vānartho nirahaṅkāriṇāṃ prabho //
GP10bhpc101u:1094: nanu tarhi te 'pi kim evaṃ sāhasam ācaranti tatrāha-kuśaleti |
GP10bhpc101u:1095: prārabdhakarmakṣapaṇamātram eva teṣāṃ kṛtyaṃ nānyad ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.33||
GP10bhpc101u:1097: kim[*88] utākhilasattvānāṃ tiryaṅmartyadivaukasām / īśituś ceśitavyānāṃ kuśalākuśalānvayaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1098_0: [*88] yadā īśitavyānāṃ niyamyānāṃ nirahaṅkāriṇāṃ jīvānāṃ kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyate
GP10bhpc101u:1098_1: tadā tiryagādirūpāṇām akhilasattvānām īśitur niyantuḥ kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyata
GP10bhpc101u:1098_2: iti kim u vaktavyam iti pūrvaślokasthena “na vidyate” iti padasaṃbandhenānvayaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1100: kuśalākuśalānvayo na vidyata iti kiṃ punar vaktavyam ity arthaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.34||
GP10bhpc101u:1103: svairaṃ caranti munayo 'pi na nahyamānās tasyecchayāttavapuṣaḥ kuta eva bandhaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1104: etad eva sphuṭīkaroti-yasya pādapaṅkajaparāgasya niṣevaṇena tṛptāḥ,
GP10bhpc101u:1105: yadvā yasya pādapaṅkajaparāge niṣevā yeṣāṃ te ca te tṛptāś ceti bhaktā ity arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1106: tathā jñāninaś ca na nahyamānā bandhanam aprāptavantaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.35||
GP10bhpc101u:1108: gopīnāṃ tatpatīnāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām /
GP10bhpc101u:1111: idānīṃ bhagavataḥ sarvāntaryāmiṇaḥ paradārasevā nāma na kācid ity āha-gopīnām iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1112: yo 'ntaś caraty adhyakṣo buddhyādisākṣī sa eva krīḍanena dehabhāk,
GP10bhpc101u:1113: na tv asmadāditulyo yena doṣaḥ syād iti ||BhPC_10,33.36||
GP10bhpc101u:1116: bhajate tādṛśīḥ krīḍā yāḥ śrutvā[*90] tatparo bhavet //
GP10bhpc101u:1119: nanv evaṃ ced āptakāmasya nindite kutaḥ pravṛttir ity ata āha-anugrahāyeti |
GP10bhpc101u:1120: śṛṅgāra-rasākṛṣṭacetaso 'tibahirmukhān api svaparān kartum iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.37||
GP10bhpc101u:1122: nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitās tasya māyayā /
GP10bhpc101u:1123: manyamānāḥ svapārśvasthān svān svān dārān vrajaukasaḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1124: nanv anye 'pi bhinnācārāḥ svaceṣṭitam evam eveti vadanti tatrāha-nāsūyann iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1125: evaṃbhūtaiśvaryābhāve tathā kurvantaḥ pāpā jñeyā iti bhāvaḥ ||BhPC_10,33.38||
GP10bhpc101u:1129: [*91] bhagavān priyo yāsāṃ, bhagavato vā priyāḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1132: vikrīḍitaṃ vrajavadhūbhir idaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ śraddhānvito 'nuśṛṇuyād atha varṇayed yaḥ /
GP10bhpc101u:1133: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati pratilabhya kāmaṃ hṛdrogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ //
GP10bhpc101u:1134: bhagavataḥ kāmavijayarūparāsakrīḍāśravaṇādeḥ kāmavijayam eva phalam āha-vikrīḍitam iti |
GP10bhpc101u:1135: acireṇa dhīraḥ san hṛdrogaṃ kāmam[*92] āśu apahinoti parityajatīti ||BhPC_10,33.40||
GP10bhpc101u:1136: [*92] yadvā kāmaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ āśu bhaktiṃ labdhvā kāmādisarvahṛdrogam acireṇa hinotīty arthaḥ |
GP10bhpc101u:1139: iti śrīmadbhāgavate mahāpurāṇe daśamaskandhe pūrvārdhe bhāvārthadīpikāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ **33**
